title: 桂枝有充分的动机和可能性，正在刻意的在全世界传播病毒
contents:
在瘟疫爆发后，面对对于防疫不利的指责，桂枝遇到了一次意识形态危机。在这个时候，桂枝能够使用的最好的手段，无疑就是把全世界都拉下水。而支那近期的文宣方向，所谓作业抄不好之类，毫无疑问是对于这个可能性的有利支持。



而以桂枝的全面控制，想要刻意制造无症状感染者是很容易的，而目前，各国显然对于这个可能性毫无防备。



另一个因素，就是产业链转移。对于桂枝而言，这场瘟疫的最致命长期影响就是产业链转移。而要减缓这个趋势，最有效的方式，就是让这场瘟疫全球化，让想转移产业链的人发现，转移到其他地方也一样。



希望品葱的各位，也能把这个可能性写成英文，更多的传播到英文论坛，英文媒体，我等下也会写一篇英文的。







China has sufficient motivation and possibility to deliberately spread the virus globally



China's recent ideological propaganda is full of gloating over the outbreak of the Wuhan virus in countries around the world. Under the propaganda of nationalist ideology, they eagerly look forward to the outbreak of the virus in other countries.



In the early days of the virus outbreak, the Chinese government encountered an ideological crisis in the face of adverse accusations of epidemic prevention and the tragedy of Wuhan.In this case,only when the virus also erupts in developed democracies can they remove their accusations and shirk their responsibilities.In fact, as the virus broke out in the West, ccp gradually regained public opinion and ideology.


On the other hand, if the virus outbreak only occurs in China, it will accelerate the global industrial chain's transfer from China.But if there is an outbreak all over the world, it will slow down the pressure of industrial chain transfer.



Therefore, the Chinese government has sufficient motivation and reasons to send agents to deliberately spread the virus around the world.Just need to deliberately export asymptomatic infected people to all over the world.Governments around the world should face up to and prevent this possibility.
